prerequisites.Special: Died or possessed by an undead

Absorb Spirit.benefit: Temporarily absorb a spirit to prevent rejuvenation

Abundant Revelations.benefit: Use a single revelation more times each day.

Accursed Hex.benefit: Target a creature with a hex a second time that day if it made its save the first time.

Accomplished Sneak Attacker.benefit: Your sneak attack damage increases by 1d6, up to half your level in dice (rounded up).

Acrobatic.benefit: +2 bonus on Acrobatics and Fly checks.

Acute Shot.benefit: Whenever you gain a magic bonus on an attack roll with a ranged weapon, you can deduct any range penalties from your damage roll, instead of your attack roll. Additionally, when you gain a magic bonus on a ranged attack roll, you can deal sneak attack damage to a target that has concealment (but not total concealment) as long as the attack otherwise qualifies to deal sneak attack damage. The maximum number of sneak attack dice you can use in this way is equal to the value of your magic bonus on attack rolls.

Adept Champion.benefit: Trade smite evil damage for bonus on combat maneuver checks.

Adept Channel.benefit: Learn how to channel energy like a cleric.

Advanced Ranger Trap.benefit: Add +1 to the Disable Device and Perception check DCs for your ranger traps.

Agent of Fear.benefit: Target a creature more often with appearances.

prerequisites.Special: A friend or ally must have been significantly corrupted by a specific natural or supernatural blight, or you must have a regional background trait tied to a specific blight.

Agent of Purity.benefit: You have devoted your life to purging blight from the world.

Agonizing Obedience.benefit: Each time you gain this feat you choose an agony. You can perform an obedience for only a single agony in a 24-hour period.

Alertness.benefit: +2 bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks.

Alien Mindpaths.benefit: Gain +4 on saves vs. mind-affecting effects and scrying.

Align Equipment.benefit: You can imbue weapons, shields, and armor with a special ability listed in the table (see text).

Alignment Channel.benefit: Channel energy can heal or harm outsiders.

Aligned Crafting.benefit: Your magical creations reject those you oppose.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast instigate psychic duel

Alter Binary Mindscape.benefit: Opponent must spend 1 extra manifestation point to defend itself.

Altitude Affinity.benefit: Become unaffected by problems with high altitude and gain a +4 bonus to Survival in high altitudes.

prerequisites.Special: No levels in a class that has inspiration

Amateur Investigator.benefit: Gain a minor pool of inspiration for use with Knowledge, Linguistics, or Spellcraft checks.

Amplified Radiance.benefit: Shed an aura of light when near allies who share this feat.

Ancestral Scorn.benefit: Whenever you successfully demoralize an outsider of the evil subtype with an Intimidate check, it becomes sickened for 1 round in addition to being affected by the normal effects of being demoralized. If you beat the DC by 5 or more, the creature is nauseated for 1 round instead.

Animal Affinity.benefit: +2 bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks.

prerequisites.Special: Must not have an animal companion or mount that advances as an animal companion

Animal Ally.benefit: Gain an animal companion as if you were a druid of your character level –3 from the following list: badger, bird, camel, cat (small), dire rat, dog, horse, pony, snake (viper), or wolf. If you later gain an animal companion through another source (such as the Animal domain, divine bond, hunter’s bond, mount, or nature bond class features), the effective druid level granted by this feat stacks with that granted by other sources.

Animal Call.benefit: Make convincing animal sounds with Bluff checks.

Animal Disguise.benefit: Disguise yourself as an animal using pelts and animal parts.

prerequisites.Special: Animal companion or mount class feature

Animal Soul.benefit: You can shrug off spells that don’t work on animals.

Antagonize.benefit: Use Diplomacy or Intimidate to goad creatures.

Arcane Blast.benefit: Sacrifice a spell to make ray attack.

Arcane Insight.benefit: You gain a +1 insight bonus to your AC for 1 round when you use the Arcane Shield feat.

Arcane Jinxer.benefit: You can expend a prepared arcane spell or available arcane spell slot to give your jinx target a penalty on its jinx save equal to the level of the expended spell or spell slot.

Arcane School Spirit.benefit: Bluff someone into reducing their save against your next spell.

Arcane Shield.benefit: Sacrifice a spell to gain deflection bonus to AC.

Arcane Talent.benefit: Cast a 0-level spell 3 times per day as a spell-like ability.

Arcane Vendetta.benefit: +2 bonus on damage vs. arcane spellcasters.

Arctic Adaptation.benefit: Treat cold environments as one step less severe, +2 Perception against creatures adapted to hide in snow, and +5 on saves to avoid snow blindness.

Area Jinx.benefit: Your jinx has a radius of 10 feet possibly affecting multiple targets.

Aspect of the Beast.benefit: Gain one of four bestial advantages.

prerequisites.Special: Maintain a positive relationship with an organization for at least 6 months or achieve a major accomplishment on behalf of an organization.

Associate.benefit: Gain a bonus on Diplomacy checks to influence members of your organization.

Athletic.benefit: +2 bonus on Climb and Swim checks.

Augment Summoning.benefit: Summoned creatures gain +4 Str and Con.

Special: aura, aura of good, or aura of evil class feature
strong or overwhelming good or evil aura

Aura Flare.benefit: Flare your alignment aura to fatigue or stagger those who oppose it.

Aversion Tolerance.benefit: You are more resistant than most to garlic, holy symbols, or mirrors, depending on your vampire type.

Babble-Peddler.benefit: Trick creatures into exchanging valuables for junk.

Banish Possessor.benefit: Whenever you cast a spell or use a spell-like ability or supernatural ability that allows a creature that is being possessed by another creature to attempt a new saving throw to end the spell or effect (such as protection from evil), the possessed creature can roll the new saving throw twice and take the better of the two results as the actual result.

Basic Harmony.benefit: You can attempt a DC 10 Perform check to aid the Perform check of an ally who also has this feat. If you succeed, your ally gains a +1 bonus for each 5 points of your check result; a check result of 10 grants a +2 bonus, a result of 15 grants a +3 bonus, and so on. If you fail, the discord applies a –5 penalty on your ally’s check.

prerequisites.Special: grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger

Battering Repair.benefit: Sometimes smacking your firearm against a solid surface is all that’s needed to unjam it. Sometimes that solid surface is a creature.

Battle Singer.benefit: You can sing in goblin so your bardic performance inspire courage ability does not affect those who do not understand goblin.

prerequisites.Special: alignment must be within one step of your deity’s

Believer’s Boon.benefit: Gain use of a 1st-level cleric domain ability.

Believer’s Hands.benefit: Use lay on hands once per day.

Bestow Hope.benefit: When you heal a creature by channeling positive energy, you also relieve its fear.

Betrayer.benefit: Gain free attack upon successful Diplomacy skill check.

Bewildering Koan.benefit: Confuse a creature by bluffing them with an impossible question.

Big Game Hunter.benefit: +1 bonus on attack rolls and +2 bonus on weapon damage rolls against Large or larger creatures.

Black Marketeer.benefit: Use black market connections to gather illegal/illicit items.

Blasting Charge.benefit: Expend a bloodrager spell slot while bloodraging to add force damage to your charge attack.

Blazing Channel.benefit: When you use your Turn Undead feat, undead failing their saving throw are engulfed in holy fire. This functions identically to catching on fire, but the damage dealt is divine (like the divine damage from flame strike) rather than fire. Water cannot extinguish this holy fire, but any negative energy effect that heals the creature of at least 5 points of damage extinguishes the flames instantly.

Bless Equipment.benefit: Expend channel energy uses to grant one weapon, suit of armor, or shield a weapon, armor, or shield special ability.

Improved Bless Equipment.benefit: Reduce the number of uses of channeled energy you must expend to bless a piece of equipment using Bless Equipment and Align Equipment decreases by one (to a minimum of one).

Greater Bless Equipment.benefit: The duration of your equipment blessings doubles and as a standard action you may bless up to two pieces of equipment with a single blessing, expending uses of channeled energy as if you had only blessed one item.

prerequisites.Alignment: within one step of your deity’s

Blessed Striker.benefit: Your attacks are considered to have the alignments you share with your deity.

Blight Guide.benefit: Your confidence in exploring dangerous regions inspires the same in your companions.

Blight Survivalist.benefit: You have learned to survive in dangerous environments.

Blinding Light.benefit: Whenever an enemy unsuccessfully attempts to counter or dispel your daylight spell-like ability, it must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Charisma modifier) or become blinded for 1 round as its mind is overwhelmed with celestial light. This is a supernatural mind-affecting effect.

Bloatmage Initiate.benefit: Learn the secret art of hemotheurgy to enhance your spells.

Blood Disciple.benefit: Combine your blood and unholy water to create potions.

Blood of Heroes.benefit: Whenever you gain a level, you gain 2 hero points instead of 1.

Blood Ties.benefit: Use Bluff instead of Diplomacy when influencing a sorcerous creature.

Blood Vengeance.benefit: Enter a rage-like state when one of your allies is taken down.

Bloodletting.benefit: Whenever you threaten a creature with a critical hit inflict bleed damage in subsequent rounds.

Blustering Bluff.benefit: Bully people into believing your Bluff

prerequisites.Feat: Great Fortitude or Iron Will or Lightning Reflexes

Bolster Jinx.benefit: A jinxed target’s penalty on Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saves increases if you have the Great Fortitude, Lightning Reflexes, or Iron Will feat, respectively.

Bolstered Resilience.benefit: Increase DR against a single attack.

Bonded Mind.benefit: As long as you can see each other, you and an ally who also has this feat can trade nonverbal messages. These function as the message spell, except that you don’t need to whisper or point, and you cannot be overheard.

Bookish Rogue.benefit: Change your rogue talent spell-like abilities with study.

Boon Companion.benefit: Calculate your animal companion/familiar abilities as if they were higher.

Branded for Retribution.benefit: Grant ally’s weapon the Bane quality against a branded opponent.

Special: worshiper of a god of luck or drink

Bravery in Action.benefit: You can add the bonus from bravery to your initiative checks.

Breadth of Experience.benefit: +2 bonus on all Knowledge and Profession checks.

Brilliant Planner.benefit: Use gold to fund unspecified plans

Brilliant Spell Preparation.benefit: Prepare spells faster in a reserved slot

Bristling Bull Rush.benefit: Deal additional damage to a foe when you successfully bull rush it through difficult terrain.

Bristling Drag.benefit: Deal additional damage to a foe when you drag it through difficult terrain.

prerequisites.Special: animal companion or mount class feature

Bully Breed.benefit: Animal companion or mount gains Intimidate as a class skill and can demoralize foes.

Burning Amplification.benefit: Whenever you cast a spell with the fire descriptor, you can take a –1 penalty on the spells’ attack rolls and reduce the spell’s saving throw DC by 1 to cause any target that is dealt fire damage to catch on fire. The targets do not take burning damage for catching on fire until their next turn, and each target can attempt a Reflex saving throw to put out the fire before being damaged each round. Rather than the normal DC 15 Reflex saving throw to put the fire out, the target must succeed at a Reflex saving throw with a DC equal 10 + the spell’s level + the modifier of your spellcasting ability score). You must choose to use this feat before making an attack roll or before your targets attempt their saving throws. This feat has no effect on spells that neither allow a saving throw nor require an attack roll.

Burn! Burn! Burn!.benefit: You deal an extra 1d4 fire damage with non-magical or alchemical attacks (such as with torches or alchemical fire) and gain a +4 competence bonus to Reflex saves to avoid catching on fire or putting yourself out when on fire.

Butterfly’s Sting.benefit: When you confirm a critical hit you may instead deal normal damage and grant the next ally to hit the same creature with a melee attack an automatic critical hit.

Call Truce.benefit: Call for a truce in combat

Camouflaged Trap.benefit: Increase the DCs of Perception checks to notice a trap you craft in a wilderness environment by +5

Careful Flyer.benefit: Avoid Fly checks and attacks of opportunity when flying slowly

Careful Sneak.benefit: Use Stealth slowly without penalty from most armor

Careful Speaker.benefit: +2 bonus on some Bluff checks and some Will saves.

Cartogramancer.benefit: Use Knowledge to find a destination for greater teleport

Cartwheel Dodge.benefit: With a successful evasion you may move half your speed.

Cat’s Fall.benefit: Take less damage when falling and always land on your feet

Caustic Slur.benefit: Bluff to insult your favored enemies into becoming overly angry.

Cecaelia Focus Tattoo.benefit: You have tattooed the humanoid portion of your skin with a swirling mark that provides you with focus and pride.

Celestial Obedience.benefit: Gain a special ability or resistance for an empyreal lord after performing a ritual.

Chakra Initiate.benefit: Gain 3 serpent-fire ki points for chakras

Chakra Adept.benefit: Gain 4 serpent-fire ki points for chakras, attempt one save to maintain chakras, and gain lingering benefits

Chakra Master.benefit: Gain 5 serpent-fire ki for chakras, can spend more ki to gain two chakra benefits

Chakra Mandala.benefit: If you fail the Fortitude saving throw to maintain your awakened chakras, you take only half the normal damage.

Special: same alignment as patron deity associated with your deity

Channel Deific Essence.benefit: Expend a use of channel energy to gain a boon

Channeled Blessing.benefit: Bestow a blessing on an ally when you channel energy.

Channeled Revival.benefit: May expend channel energy to cast breath of life.

Channeled Shield Wall.benefit: Enhance your shield and the shields of allies adjacent to you.

Channeling Scourge.benefit: Inquisitor levels count as cleric levels for channeling damage.

Channel Ray.benefit: Channel energy in a ray instead of a burst.

prerequisites.Special: Spirit Ridden or spirit class feature

Channel Spirit.benefit: You can willingly allow spirits to possess you, trading a taste of your life for their knowledge and abilities.

Special: must worship and receive spells from a deity

Channeling Variance.benefit: Choose one variant channeling ability that matches one of your deity’s domains, subdomains, or areas of concern. 3x/day when you channel energy, you can apply the modifications of the chosen variant channeling ability to your channeled energy, including reductions to the damage dealt or healing performed by your channeled energy. (See feat for additional details.)

Charming Performance.benefit: You can use Perform, rather than Diplomacy, to improve an NPC’s starting attitude toward you.

prerequisites.Special: ability to control or create undead

Charnel Soldiers.benefit: When you create undead, they gain one teamwork feat you know as a bonus feat, though they gain its benefits only when cooperating with you or with other undead that you have created. If you control undead with the Command Undead feat or a spell like command undead, they likewise gain one teamwork feat you know as a bonus feat as long as they remain under your control. Intelligent undead gain no benefit from this feat.

Childlike.benefit: +2 on Disguise checks to look like human child, take 10 on Bluff checks.

Child of Two Fates.benefit: Gain a human or elf ally’s teamwork feat temporarily

Chilling Amplification.benefit: Whenever you cast a spell with the cold descriptor, you can take a –1 penalty on attack rolls made with the spell and reduce the spell saving throw’s DC by 1 to cause any target that is dealt cold damage by the spell to have its movement speed reduced by 5 feet and become unable to take 5-foot steps. This effect lasts for 1 round + 1 round per 3 spell levels of the spell. You must choose to use this feat before making an attack roll or before your targets attempt their saving throws. This feat has no effect on spells that neither allow a saving throw nor require an attack roll.

City Sprinter.benefit: Move quickly and safely through urban terrain

Clarity of Pain.benefit: Damage yourself to fight off a charm or compulsion

Special: Able to cast remove disease or the ability to cure disease with a mercy

Cleansing Burst.benefit: When you channel positive energy to harm or turn undead creatures, any undead creatures in the area lose the ability to cause disease with their melee and ranged attacks for 1d4+1 rounds. If an undead creature successfully saves against your channeled energy, this duration is reduced to 1 round for that creature. Immunity to positive energy negates this ability. When you channel positive energy to heal living creatures, any living creatures in the area gain a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws against disease for 1d4+1 rounds. Creatures not healed by positive energy receive no benefit.

Combat Advice.benefit: Grant an ally a competence bonus on next attack roll against a chosen enemy.

Combat Casting.benefit: +4 bonus on concentration checks for casting defensively.

Combat Distraction.benefit: Your antics in combat cause others to suffer a -2 penalty to Perception and Concentration checks.

Command Animals.benefit: Use channeled energy to control animals

Command Plants.benefit: Use channeled energy to control plants

Command Undead.benefit: Channel energy can be used to control undead.

prerequisites.Special: own a figurine of wondrous power

Companion Figurine.benefit: Use your figurine of wondrous power as your animal companion or familiar.

Compelling Harmonies.benefit: As a standard action, you may expend one round of bardic performance to boost the effectiveness of the bardic performance of an ally within 60 feet who also has this feat. Until the beginning of your next turn, if that ally uses a bardic performance that allows a saving throw, increase that saving throw DC by 2.

Compounded Pain.benefit: Apply the effects of two stare feats to painful stares

Conceal Scent.benefit: Creatures cannot track you by scent.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast 3rd level spells or use a 3rd-level spell-like ability

Confabulist.benefit: Follow a failed lie with another lie

prerequisites.Special: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature

Confounding Tumble Deed.benefit: When you avoid attacks of opportunity and hit a foe, you can deny it its Dex bonus to AC for 1 round.

prerequisites.Special: Serf in service to a lord

Conscript.benefit: When wielding a farm implement (such as hand axe, pick, pitchfork, or scythe) as a weapon, get +1 bonus on damage rolls. When fighting alongside other conscripts get +1 bonus on init checks.

Contingent Channeling.benefit: May transfer positive energy to ally who can use it to heal.

Conviction.benefit: Vampires are more averse to your holy symbols than normal.

prerequisites.Special: racial spell-like ability of 1st level or higher

Cooperative Counterspelling.benefit: When you and an ally with this feat both ready actions to counterspell, you gain additional counterspelling options

Cooperative Crafting.benefit: +2 bonus on Craft or Spellcraft checks while working together.

Cooperative Disabling.benefit: Ally can attempt a second Disable Device check as an immediate action

Coordinated Blast.benefit: Exclude allies with this feat from area spells and abilities

Corsair.benefit: +2 initiative while on ships, +1 damage with light or one-handed weapons on ships.

Cosmopolitan.benefit: Read and speak two additional languages.

Counterpoint to Inspiration.benefit: When an ally with this feat is within 60 feet and uses a bardic performance or raging song that grants allies a morale bonus or competence bonus, you may perform the same bardic performance or raging song to increase those bonuses by +1. This increase only lasts as long as you and your ally each maintain the same performance, and cannot be extended with effects like Lingering Performance. Additional bards with this feat beyond the second don’t increase the bonuses further.

Counterspell, Improved.benefit: Counterspell with spell of the same school.

Coven Caster.benefit: As a standard action, you can attempt a special aid another action (1d20 + your choice of your Intelligence or Charisma modifier; DC 10). If you succeed, you can increase an adjacent spellcaster’s caster level by 1 until the beginning of your next turn. If you also have the coven witch hex, you can apply this bonus to all members of your coven within 30 feet.

Cover Tracks.benefit: Increase the DC of Survival checks to track you and your allies

Cranial Adjustment.benefit: You can perform the hypnotism occult skill unlock even if you can’t use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use hypnotism one additional time per day.

Cranial Implantation.benefit: You can perform the phrenology occult skill unlock, though you must use needles or similar sharp implements rather than your fingertips, dealing 1d3 points of damage to the subject. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use phrenology one additional time per day.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast consecrate or desecrate

Create Reliquary Arms and Shields.benefit: Make your shield or weapon a holy symbol.

Create Sanguine Elixir.benefit: Create an elixir that allows another to use a bloodline power.

prerequisites.Special: Channel energy and flurry of blows class feature
prerequisites.Feat: Weapon Focus with deity’s favored weapon

Crusader’s Flurry.benefit: May use flurry of blows with deity’s favored melee weapon.

Cutting Humiliation.benefit: Humiliate someone to weaken Charisma-based checks

Cypher Magic.benefit: Gain bonuses to CL when using scrolls.

Cypher Script.benefit: You are more efficient at using your spellbook.

Deadly Dealer.benefit: Throw cards (such as harrow cards) as if they were darts.

Deadly Trap.benefit: Increase one of your trap’s critical threat multiplier by one or give it a +4 bonus on rolls to confirm critical hits

Deadly Troupe.benefit: Gain a +4 bonus on certain combat maneuver checks and skill checks against foes threatened by allies with this feat

Death’s Host.benefit: You become harder to kill when possessed by the undead.

Deceitful.benefit: +2 bonus on Bluff and Disguise checks.

Deceptive Exchange.benefit: Upon successful feint, you may force opponent to accept an object.

Deep Diver.benefit: Gain bonuses on diving into water and swimming deep underwater; hold your breath for longer than normal

Deep Drinker.benefit: Gain 2 temporary ki from drunken ki.

Deepsight.benefit: Your darkvision has a range of 120 feet.

Defending Eidolon.benefit: Your eidolon sacrifices its attacks to defend you.

Deft Catcher.benefit: Use Sleight of Hand to avoid dropping an item

Deft Hands.benefit: +2 bonus on Disable Device and Sleight of Hand checks.

Deific Obedience.benefit: Once you’ve performed a specified obedience, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the “Obedience” entry for the god to whom you performed the obedience.

Demonic Obedience.benefit: Gain boons from your demon lord.

Deny Death.benefit: Use ki to stave off death.

Desert Dweller.benefit: Treat hot environments as one step less severe; reduced penalties for thirst and a +4 bonus on saves to avoid desert-related visual hazards such as mirages

Destroy Identity.benefit: Whenever you score a critical hit target takes Charisma damage and becomes staggered.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast dispel magic or greater dispel magic

Destructive Dispel.benefit: Upon successful dispel, opponent must save or is stunned.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast detect chaos, detect evil, detect good, detect law, or detect magic

Diehard.benefit: Automatically stabilize and remain conscious below 0 hp.

Die for Your Master.benefit: Tumor familiar dies in place of its master.

prerequisites.Special: 2 ranks each in 5 different Knowledge skills

Dilettante.benefit: +2 bonus in Knowledge skills with 1-5 ranks and make higher DC untrained Knowledge checks.

prerequisites.Special: Abundant step class feature or ability to cast dimension door

Dimensional Agility.benefit: May take any additional actions remaining after using dimension door or abundant step

Dimensional Assault.benefit: May use dimension door or abundant step as part of a charge action.

Dimensional Dervish.benefit: During full-attack action, you may cast dimension door or use abundant step as a swift action.

Dimensional Maneuvers.benefit: Gain +4 on combat maneuver checks while using Dimensional Dervish.

Dimensional Savant.benefit: Provide flanking from all squares you attack from when using Dimensional Dervish

Diplomatic Ruse.benefit: Take a free action as part of your initiative check

Disabling Dweomer.benefit: Use Disable Device to suppress magic items.

prerequisites.Special: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature

Disarming Threat Deed.benefit: Use Intimidate without making the target unfriendly.

Disciplinary Devotee.benefit: Gain +1 on caster level checks, concentration checks, and saving throws for discipline spells

prerequisites.Special: Bardic knowledge class ability or Knowledge domain

Skill.Knowledge: 3 ranks each in two different Knowledge skills

Disconcerting Knowledge.benefit: Demoralize a foe by proving you know its weaknesses

Discordant Voice.benefit: When using bardic performance, allies deal 1d6 extra sonic damage.

Dislocate.benefit: As a swift action, you can deal 1d8 points of nonlethal damage to yourself as you pop your joints from their sockets, making yourself more flexible though suffering incredible pain.

Disorienting Maneuver.benefit: After successful tumble through opponent’s square, gain +2 on attack rolls vs. that opponent.

Dispel Synergy.benefit: Dispel magic target takes a –2 penalty on saves.

Dispelling Fist.benefit: May cast dispel magic as a swift action after an attack.

Disposable Weapon.benefit: Break a fragile weapon to confirm a critical hit.

Disruptive Recall.benefit: Use spell recall after disrupting an opponent’s spell.

prerequisites.Special: Deliver touch spells class feature, phantom class feature

Distant Delivery.benefit: Phantom can deliver touch spells 20 feet farther

Distant Jinx.benefit: The range of your jinx increases by 30 feet.

prerequisites.Special2: animal companion, eidolon, familiar, or other allied creature with the share spells ability

Distant Spell Link.benefit: The range of your allied creature’s share spells ability increases to close (25 feet + 5 feet for every 2 levels) as long as you have line of effect to the creature when you cast the shared spell.

prerequisites.Special: alignment must match that of your worshiped deity

Diverse Obedience.benefit: You are treated as though you had 2 more Hit Dice than you actually do for the purposes of determining what divine boons you gain as a result of performing your deity’s obedience and whenever you would gain a boon as a result of your Deific Obedience feat (and not through a prestige class), you can choose among the options available for evangelist, exalted, or sentinel boons.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast augury or divination

Divination Guide.benefit: When you cast augury or divination, you gain a +1 sacred bonus on all saving throws for 10 minutes per your CL in the class you used to cast the spell.

prerequisites.Special: alignment must match that of your worshiped deity

Divine Communion.benefit: Once per day as a swift action, you can ponder whether or not your deity would approve or disapprove of a particular course of action, and whether that action would impact your alignment. The GM decides if the action is one your deity would approve of, and if it is, you gain an insight bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1) on any d20 roll made in association with that action during this round. For every 3 ranks you have in Knowledge (religion), you can use this ability an additional time per day, to a maximum of 6 times a day.

Divine Deception.benefit: +5 bonus on UMD checks with divine items.

Divine Defiance.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against divine spells and the spell-like abilities granted by levels in a divine casting class.

Divine Interference.benefit: Sacrifice a spell to force an enemy to reroll a successful attack against your ally.

Divine Protection.benefit: Gain a bonus equal to your Charisma bonus on a saving throw.

Diviner’s Delving.benefit: +2 bonus on CL checks with divinations.

Dog Killer-Horse Hunter.benefit: You gain a +2 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls as well as rolls to confirm critical hits against dogs and horses (and similar creatures).

Double Bane.benefit: Apply your bane to a second weapon.

Draconic Defender.benefit: Grant a nearby ally your dodge bonus from fighting defensively or Combat Expertise.

prerequisites.Special: base Will +10, any lawful alignment, dragon type

Draconic Discipline.benefit: Get a second retry on necromancy or mind-affecting enchantment spells.

Dragonbane Aura.benefit: Aura of courage expands and grants protection against dragon breath weapons.

prerequisites.Special: divine bond (weapon) or sacred weapon class feature

Dual Enhancement.benefit: Imbue two weapons with divine bond or sacred weapon instead of just one.
